__e: Those are clever words for a man about to be an appetizer.
Do you have any more wise words that you want me to take with me?
However, you know, it doesn't hurt to talk to him... if you have any sage words of feminine advice.
This is my goal... given me by my wise and powerful parents.
Well, we shall see who is sane and who is crazy around here.
I fell on my back! Wendell: You okay, Mr. Summers?
Wise men don't jump off buildings.
Not too many of them, but sound men, every one.
They are good men and there are many others, men of rank and wisdom.
